altTitles.ja-ro: SSSS.GRIDMAN Comic Anthology SIDE: Takarada Rikka
SSSS.GRIDMAN Comic Anthology SIDE: Shinjou Akane

altTitles.ja: SSSS.GRIDMAN コミックアンソロジー SIDE:宝多六花
SSSS.GRIDMAN コミックアンソロジー SIDE:新条アカネ

description.ja:
Collection of short stories based on the original anime SSSS.GRIDMAN.

---
**Volume 1 - Side Takarada Rikka**:
Cover: [Yatomi](https://mangadex.org/author/a6ecab54-549a-4eb3-9ebc-4fa35adeb4a7)
Illustration: Rolua (ろるあ)

**Chapters**:
- Chapter 1. *Yume no Hero* by Isobe Kazuma
- Chapter 2 by Akina Tsukako
- Chapter 3. *Dear My Friend* by Youkanchi (Cosmic)
- Chapter 4 by Wata Ruh
- Chapter 5 by Shiroishi Kotoni
- Chapter 6 by Leon
- Chapter 7 by Yatomi
- Chapter 8 by Kanro Ame
- Chapter 9 by Shouji Nigou
- Chapter 10 by Aoi Aiu
- Chapter 11 by Inoue Kaku
- Chapter 12 by Takamura Masaya
- Chapter 13 by Ginmoku
- Chapter 14 by Jako
---
**Volume 2 - Side Shinjou Akane**:
Cover: [Hyuga Azuri](https://mangadex.org/author/e792a7f6-027b-4e17-9ad6-570a79a3792e)
Illustration: Mugcup (マグカップ)

**Chapters**:
- Chapter 1. **Shocked** (Dokkiri) by Niina Ryou
- Chapter 2 by Imu Sanjo
- Chapter 3 by Iwatobi Hiro
- Chapter 4. **For the Sake of Akane-chan** by Hashimoto Kurara
- Chapter 5 by Uzaki Uso
- Chapter 6 by Ohara Hiroki
- Chapter 7 by NEGI
- Chapter 8. **I am God** by Mutou Tamura
- Chapter 9 by Momose
- Chapter 10 by Matsuda Hikari
- Chapter 11 by Takai Isshiki
- Chapter 12. **Pretty Nice** by Sohin
- Chapter 13. **The Melancholy of Akane Shinjou** by Yoshikita Popuri
- Chapter 14 by Akechi Shizuku
- Chapter 15. *Akane-chan no Nichijou* by Gyaasu
- Chapter 16 by Taneda Yuuta
- Chapter 17 by Grande
